name: InfoLink
author: Sirlon

sections.installation:
1. Upload all the files in /wp-content/plugins/infolink/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Start writing posts with a mutch easier way to get Links.
sections.faq:
How to use ?

Select a Word or Sentence or anything else you want to link.
Select the service you want to use by pressing the arrow on the right side of the button. the Service would be saved to the button itself until you chose another.
A window will open, if you direktly click “Insert” the best search result for the word will be taken.

At the bottom you will see the search results, with one click on the “Set Button” you can change link and title.

Finaly click on Insert.
Your Word is now linked to the site you wanted.

short_description: Quickly add Links to Wikipedia, IMDB Sites or search for site/blog or news with Google. And New with 1.3 also your bookmarked Links.
